channel.title: CVE Feed for xpeedstudio -- FundEngine – Donation and Crowdfunding Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for xpeedstudio -- FundEngine – Donation and Crowdfunding Platform

item.title: CVE-2024-6698|2024-08-01T14:10:21.095Z -- xpeedstudio -- fundengine%20%E2%80%93%20donation%20and%20crowdfunding%20platform
item.description: The FundEngine plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to privilege escalation in all versions up to, and including, 1.7.0. This is due to the plugin not properly verifying user meta updated through the update_user_meta function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to update their user meta which can be leveraged to update their capabilities to gain administrator access.

item.title: CVE-2024-6698|2024-08-01T03:29:58.918Z -- xpeedstudio -- fundengine%20%E2%80%93%20donation%20and%20crowdfunding%20platform
item.description: The FundEngine plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to privilege escalation in all versions up to, and including, 1.7.0. This is due to the plugin not properly verifying user meta updated through the update_user_meta function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to update their user meta which can be leveraged to update their capabilities to gain administrator access.
